nodes.text: Durace was a toxic, barren planet in a hostile region of space in the Unknown Regions. Although the atmosphere was breathable, Durace's hostile weather made colonization difficult.
When first discovered by the Galactic Republic cruiser Galaaron during the Great Hyperspace War, Durace was a pleasant world.
During the Galactic War, a pharmaceutical company hired individuals to retrieve some of Duraces extremely rare and widely banned flowers which could be dried and ingested for medicinal purposes.
At some point though, a large-scale disaster ruined the planet.
